ModMetaData.name: What's for sale?
ModMetaData.author: Kikohi
ModMetaData.description:
What's for sale allows you to know what the world settlements sells before visiting them.
By default you only get trade stock informations when you built a powered comms console. And only industrial and higher tech level faction will be able to send you theses informations. But there is also settings that allow to change those behaviors. Go check them out!
